name: Infant Program (6 weeks - 1.5yrs)
description: Their infant program is designed to offer a safe, clean, and loving environment with knowledgeable teachers who honor the family’s routine and the child's individual needs. Schedule includes: - Morning Snack - Circle time - Enrichment Program (Varies Daily) - Outdoor Play/Small Group Activities rotation - Lunch - Nap - Afternoon Snack - Story Time/Literacy - Small Group activities/Child Choice Activities - Free exploration & play time

howToGetIt: They have a rolling enrollment system i.e. you can join any time of the year, if space is available. Please email them for tour information [valencia@creativegardenslearning.com]. After the tour, you may turn in an application to enroll. If there is no space, you may fill out a waiting list form, and we'll contact you as soon as a space becomes available.
